summary: An ordinance providing for the subpoenaing and securing the attendance of witnesses, administering oaths thereto, the mode of issuing and serving subpoenas and proof of service thereof, and for the production of books, records, papers, documents, writings and things under their control, before the special investigating committee appointed by the City Council, September 26, 1910, pursuant to Resolution No. 2950, and providing a penalty for the violation thereof and declaring an emergency.
